channel.title: Opnsense on agren.cc
channel.description: Recent content in Opnsense on agren.cc

item.title: Manually set up services on OPNsense
item.description: One of the main benefits of OPNsense is obviously the web interface, but if you just want to set up a service manually like on FreeBSD, here’s how you can do it. In this case, we’re setting up dnscrypt-proxy.
